metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47234 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. A crash can occur when processing a crafted BGP UPDATE message with a MP_UNREACH_NLRI attribute and additional NLRI data (that lacks mandatory path attributes).

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr mdeslaur> The code in quagga is different, there is no indication quagga is vulnerable to this issue, marking as not-affected for now

criterions.comment: quagga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
